"Explore our successful home designs, renovations, and constructions."

Modern Home Design

Complete renovation of a mid-century home, with a modern and stylish finish.

Luxury Villa

A luxurious villa with spacious interiors and stunning views of the ocean.

Modern Minimalist

Sleek and sophisticated, this home boasts open-plan living spaces filled with natural light. high ceilings, and a neutral colour palette create a sense of calm and order.

Ivy Lodge

A cozy, ivy-covered lodge tucked into the mountains, offering warmth and rustic elegance.

The Haven on Hilltop

A serene residence located at the top of a hill, offering sweeping views of the surrounding landscape.

Rosewood Retreat

Set in a blooming garden filled with roses and fragrant flowers, this retreat is a sanctuary.

Victorian Terrace

Designed with sustainability in mind, this home incorporates solar panels, a green roof, and reclaimed materials throughout.

Industrial Chic

An edgy, modern kitchen that combines raw, industrial elements with sleek, contemporary design.

Coastal Breeze

This interior design brings the feeling of a beach house into the home, combining breezy coastal vibes with modern elegance.

Art Deco Delight

A tranquil, peaceful interior designed for relaxation and mindfulness. Minimalist furniture and an abundance of natural light.

Blue Water Haven

Overlooking a crystal-clear lake, this house features expansive windows and a peaceful atmosphere.

Sunset Ridge

Perched on a hill that offers panoramic views of the horizon, this house is the perfect spot to watch the sun dip below the earth.
